post.value_home: HI, MY NAME IS ANDREI COJOCARU AND I'M A SOFTWARE DEVELOPER

post.value_main: Hello, I'm Andrei, and I'm 24 years old. Here you'll find some details about me to get to know me better

post.value_vol: Since I was a child, I have been involved in volunteering organizations where we participated in charity events and environmental clean-up activities. That's why, as soon as I got to college, I joined the FIRESC association, where I managed to hold a leadership position for two years. There, we organized events for students and provided support for the activities that the faculty had.

post.value_univ: I graduated from Stefan cel Mare University with a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science.

post.value_deg: My bachelor degree consisted in the design of an intelligent system to control of a tarpaulin for terraces. The aim of the project was to develop and implement an embedded system aiming to automate and simplify a human action. The system uses a rain sensor to close or open the tarpaulins depending on the weather outside, a set of buttons for its manual operation and a mobile application for a remote control. For that I used a Raspberry Pi because I could use the multiâ€‘Threading part and a wireless connection with the phone. To make the project I used Python and Thonny IDE for programming the Raspberry PI and for the mobile application I used Android Studio with Java.
